mapper.select: SELECT class_id, duty_date, start_time, stop_time, class_id, STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(duty_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i:%s') ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) start, STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(duty_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(stop_time, '%H:%i:%s') ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) stop FROM (SELECT bs.class_id, bs.duty_date, start_time, stop_time FROM sys_schedule bs LEFT JOIN sys_class bc ON bc.class_id = bs.class_id WHERE bs.class_id is not null and bs.class_id != 0 and ((duty_date = CURDATE() AND stop_time >= CURTIME()) OR duty_date = date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) -- ((duty_date = date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -2 DAY) AND stop_time >= CURTIME()) OR duty_date = date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)) AND bs.dept_id = #{deptId} GROUP BY duty_date, bs.class_id ORDER BY duty_date, start_time, stop_time) a

select sd.dept_id id, sd.weights from cust_area_dept cad left join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_id = cad.dept_id where area_id = #{areaId} and sd.status = 0 and weights > 0 order by weights desc, sd.dept_id asc
select dept_id id, weights from sys_dept where parent_id = #{deptId} and sys_dept.status = 0 and weights > 0 order by weights desc, dept_id asc
